bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Wireless Access in Vehicular Environments--Security Services for Applications and Management Messages Amendment 2: Protocol Data Unit (PDU) Functional Types and Encryption Key Management

IEEE Draft Standard for Wireless Access in Vehicular Environments--Security Services for Applications and Management Messages Amendment 2: Protocol Data Unit (PDU) Functional Types and Encryption Key Management

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Secure message formats and processing for use by Wireless Access in Vehicular Environments (WAVE) devices, including methods to secure WAVE management messages and methods to secure application messages are defined. Administrative functions necessary to support the core security functions are also defined.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
